document.full_text: mr. smith's strategies enlivened the offenses at u.c.l.a., alabama and arizona, and he was the coach at army in the difficult years at the end of the vietnam war.
document.title: homer smith, innovative college football coach, dies at 79
lines_and_colors: mr. smith's strategies enlivened the offenses at u.c.l.a., alabama and arizona, and he was the coach at army in the difficult years at the end of the vietnam war.
